nodes.text: Sasana was a female salesperson who worked for Kontag. Around 76 BBY, she invited Jedi Master Dooku and his Padawan Qui-Gon Jinn to a factory where she gave information on Lorian Nod's whereabouts. Since Dooku expressed a wish to be allowed to visit the factories, Sasana didn't want to lose the potential order and agreed to ally the Jedi in tracking Nod.
